A B C D E F G I L M N P R S T U V W

A

add(Vector2D) - Method in class Vector2D
Adds the given vector v to this vector and stores the result in this vector.

B

BUILDING_SPACING - Static variable in class GameLogic
The space to put between buildings, in pixels.
BUILDING_WIDTH - Static variable in class GameLogic
The width of each building, in pixels.
Building - class Building.
This class represents a simple two-dimensional building in the Missile Command game world.
Building() - Constructor for class Building
Creates a new Building instance with everything set to their default values.
Building(Vector2D, Vector2D) - Constructor for class Building
Creates a new instance of the building with everything set to their default value except the vectors describing the top left and bottom right corners.
buildings - Variable in class GameState
A list of all currently active (alive) buildings in the game.

C

currentRadius - Variable in class Explosion
The radius of the explosion measured in pixels.

D

DefenderExplosion - class DefenderExplosion.
This class represents a defender explosion, an explosion made by the player in the Missile Command game world.
DefenderExplosion() - Constructor for class DefenderExplosion
Constructs a DefenderExplosion with its default values.
DefenderExplosion(Vector2D, int, int) - Constructor for class DefenderExplosion
Constructs a DefenderExplosion with a current radius of 0 centered at the Vector2D location, with the specified maximum radius (in pixels) and rate of growth (in pixels per time step).
damage(float) - Method in class Building
Damages this building by the given amount.
damage - Variable in class Explosion
The damage of the explosion, floating point value between 0 and 1
distanceTo(Vector2D) - Method in class Vector2D
Returns the distance between this vector and the given vector v.
dot(Vector2D) - Method in class Vector2D
Returns the dot product between this vector and the given vector c

E

Explosion - class Explosion.
This class represents a simple two-dimensional explosion in the Missile Command game world.
Explosion() - Constructor for class Explosion
Creates a new instance of Explosion, with everything set to its default value.
Explosion(Vector2D, int, int) - Constructor for class Explosion
Constructs an Explosion with a current radius of 0 centered at the Vector2D location, with the specified maximum radius (in pixels) and rate of growth (in pixels per time step).
explode() - Method in class Explosion
Increase the explosion radius by the rate of growth for one time step.
explode() - Method in class Missile
Explodes the missile by returning an explosion object centered at the current location of the missile
explosions - Variable in class GameState
A list of all currently active explosions in the game.

F

FADE_RATE - Static variable in class GameDisplay
The rate at which the display is faded.

G

GameController - class GameController.
This class represents the GameController which runs the Missile Command game and handles user input.
GameController(GameDisplay, Scoreboard, GameLogic) - Constructor for class GameController
Constructs a new GameController using the specified components
GameDisplay - class GameDisplay.
This class implements the main display area for the Missile Command game.
GameDisplay(int, int) - Constructor for class GameDisplay
Creates a new instance of GameDisplay with the given width and height
GameLogic - class GameLogic.
This class implements all the game logic for Missile Command game.
GameLogic() - Constructor for class GameLogic
Creates a new instance of GameLogic with all fields set to their default values.
GameState - class GameState.
This class implements a structure to keep track of a Missile Command game's state.
GameState() - Constructor for class GameState
Creates a new instance in which all the public fields are initialized to default values, except for GameState.worldWidth and GameState.worldHeight.
getBottomRight() - Method in class Building
Returns the point object that defines the bottom right corner of the building
getCurrentRadius() - Method in class Explosion
Returns the current radius of the explosion.
getDamage() - Method in class Explosion
Returns the damage of this explosion
getExplosionSize() - Method in class Missile
Returns the explosion size of the missile.
getGrowthSpeed() - Method in class Explosion
Returns the rate of growth (in pixels per time step) of the explosion
getHealth() - Method in class Building
Returns the current health of this building.
getHeight() - Method in class GameDisplay
Returns the height of the display, in pixels.
getIComp() - Method in class Vector2D
Returns the i component of this vector
getJComp() - Method in class Vector2D
Returns the j component of this vector
getLocation() - Method in class Explosion
Returns the location of the center of the explosion
getLocation() - Method in class Missile
Returns the location of the missile.
getMaxRadius() - Method in class Explosion
Returns the maximum radius of the explosion
getRepairRate() - Method in class Building
Returns the repair rate of this building.
getSize() - Method in class GameDisplay
Returns the dimensions of the display, in pixels.
getSize() - Method in class Missile
Returns the size of the missile
getTopLeft() - Method in class Building
Get the object that defines the top left corner of the building.
getVelocity() - Method in class Missile
Returns the velocity of the missile.
getWidth() - Method in class GameDisplay
Returns the width of the display, in pixels.
growthSpeed - Variable in class Explosion
The growth speed measured in radius pixels per time step.

I

initializeGameState(GameState) - Method in class GameLogic
Initializes the game state by setting the power and adding buildings.
intersects(Missile) - Method in class Explosion
Checks if this explosion intersects the given missile
intersects(Building) - Method in class Explosion
Checks if this explosion interescts the given building
isDestroyed() - Method in class Building
Checks if the building is destroyed
isGameOver(GameState) - Method in class GameLogic
Checks if the game is over
isInterior(Vector2D) - Method in class Building
Checks if the given vector is interior to the building.

L

location - Variable in class Explosion
The location of the center of the explosion.

M

MAX_EXPLOSION_SIZE - Static variable in class Missile
The maximum size of an explosion that a missile can have.
MAX_HEIGHT - Static variable in class GameLogic
The maximum height to make each building, in pixels.
MAX_NR_OF_MISSILES - Static variable in class GameLogic
The maximum nr of missiles in the game
MAX_VEL - Static variable in class GameLogic
Used to determine the velocity of newly created missiles.
MIN_EXPLOSION_SIZE - Static variable in class Missile
The minimum size of an explosion that a missile can have.
Missile - class Missile.
This class implements a simple two-dimensional missile in the Missile Command game world.
Missile(Vector2D, Vector2D) - Constructor for class Missile
Creates a new Missile with everything set to its default value except the location and velocity which are specified by the arguments
MissileCommandApplication - class MissileCommandApplication.
This class implements the missile command game as a stand-alone application.
MissileCommandApplication() - Constructor for class MissileCommandApplication
Creates and shows a new missile command game display.
MissileExplosion - class MissileExplosion.
This class represent the explosion from a missile on the Missile Command game
MissileExplosion(Vector2D, int, int) - Constructor for class MissileExplosion
Constructs an Explosion with a current radius of 0 centered at the Vector2D location, with the specified maximum radius (in pixels) and rate of growth (in pixels per time step).
magnitude() - Method in class Vector2D
Returns the magnitude of this vector
main(String[]) - Static method in class MissileCommandApplication
Runs the missile command application
main(String[]) - Static method in class Scoreboard
Shows a window with a scoreboard.
main(String[]) - Static method in class Vector2D
Main method for testing this class.
maxRadius - Variable in class Explosion
The maximum radius of the explosion measured in pixels.
missiles - Variable in class GameState
A list of all currently active missiles in the game.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class GameController
Registers a click whenever a mouse button is pushed down.
move() - Method in class Missile
Move the location of the missile by its velocity vector.

N

NR_OF_BUILDINGS - Static variable in class GameLogic
The nr of buildings in the game

P

POWER_HIT - Static variable in class GameLogic
Power loss rate (per click).
POWER_REGEN - Static variable in class GameLogic
Power regeneration rate.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class GameDisplay
Paints the display using the specified Graphics object.
playerClicks - Variable in class GameState
A list of all unprocessed clicks by the player.
power - Variable in class GameState
The player's current power level.

R

repair() - Method in class Building
Repairs the building by increasing the health of the building by the repair rate.
run() - Method in class GameController
Runs the game.

S

Scoreboard - class Scoreboard.
This class displays the score and current power level of a Missile Command game.
Scoreboard() - Constructor for class Scoreboard
Creates a panel that displays the current score and power level.
score - Variable in class GameState
The player's current score.

Set the location of the bottom right corner of the building to the argument without duplicating the argument.

Set the current radius of the explosion.

Sets the damage of this explosion

Sets the explosion size, making sure it is in the appropriate range.

Sets how many pixels the radius of the explosion will grow every time step.

setSize(int) - Method in class Missile
Sets the size of the missile
setTopLeft(Vector2D) - Method in class Building

setVelocity(Vector2D) - Method in class Missile
Sets the velocity of the missile.
startGame() - Method in class GameController
Starts a new game.
subtract(Vector2D) - Method in class Vector2D
Substracts the given vector v from this vector and stores the result in this vector.

T

toString() - Method in class Vector2D
Returns a string representation of this vector

U

update(GameState) - Method in class GameDisplay
Updates the display by using the provided (non-null) state object to draw the current set of buildings, explosions, and missiles.
updateCycle(GameState) - Method in class GameLogic
Runs the game for one time step.
updateScoreboard(GameState) - Method in class Scoreboard
Updates the scoreboard's components (display) using the provided game state data, which should not be null.

V

Vector2D - class Vector2D.
This class represents a two dimensional vector.
Vector2D() - Constructor for class Vector2D
Default constructor creating a Vector with zero magnitude
Vector2D(int, int) - Constructor for class Vector2D
Creates a vector with i and j values given by the arguments.
Vector2D(Vector2D) - Constructor for class Vector2D
Copies the input vector, producing a new duplicate vector.

W

worldHeight - Variable in class GameState
The height of the game world (in pixels).
worldWidth - Variable in class GameState
The width of the game world (in pixels).
